Package org.cryptacular.spec

Class CodecSpec

java.lang.Object
org.cryptacular.spec.CodecSpec
All Implemented Interfaces:
Spec<Codec>
public class CodecSpec extends Object implements Spec<Codec>
Describes a string-to-byte encoding and provides a means to create a new instance of the codec via the newInstance() method.
Author:
Middleware Services
